title: Premiere: The Gromble – Creepy Jr.
content:
Cute Cali boys making dreamy beach music? I’m in! Laguna’s alt-rock, 5-piece, The Gromble, have already released two stellar tracks titled “Slam” and “Don’t Stand A Chance” with strong receptions.

 Named after a monster from Cartoon Network’s prime its not surprising that these guys have a real knack for 90’s alt rock. You may remember The Gromble of Ahhh Real Monsters fame. Steven, Stefan, Spencer, Spencer and Trevin (woah double names!) offer up their third release, Creepy Jr, that floats heavy and golden like a setting summer sun. Creepy plays out like an ode to the beach bum who gave up goals for a girl and ambition for waves…whether he wanted to or not. Time to get lost in this heat dream.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d20
